thread.title: Premier, Division One Clubs to submit information on coaches to GFA Technical Directorate
thread.title_full: Premier, Division One Clubs to submit information on coaches to GFA Technical Directorate

title: Premier, Division One Clubs to submit information on coaches to GFA Technical Directorate
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 18:42 CET Premier, Division One Clubs to submit information on coaches to GFA Technical Directorate By Ghana FA 
The Ghana Football Association has requested that all Premier, Division One and National teams should provide the underlisted particulars of their Coach. 
• Name• Coaching License(s) with dates and photocopies (inclusive) 
• Contacts (Cell Number and Email address)• Nationality• Passport, National ID/Voters ID for verification. Clubs should notify their respective coaches to submit the following additions; 
• CV• Philosophy (Coaching)• Strategic PlanKindly note that, these information must reach the Technical Directorate of the GFA by close of day on 30th October, 2015.
